documentation.text: @notice Transfers tokens held by timelock to beneficiary.

devdoc.details: A token holder contract that will allow a beneficiary to extract the tokens after a given release time. Useful for vesting schedules with cliff period.

constructor.details: Sets the token address to be vested. token_ value is immutable: they can only be set once during construction.

params.amount: The amount of token to be locked.
params.beneficiary: The address, who can release token after vesting duration.

returns._0: the total token stored in the contract

withdraw().notice: Transfers tokens held by timelock to beneficiary.
